epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

product_description.classification: Non-Dangerous Goods according to the Australian Code for the Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail

lca_information.scope: cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options, modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.time_representativeness: 2022 calendar year production data for plant, 2025 calendar year production data for mix
lca_information.allocation: Physical allocation based on weight or m³ of concrete; economic allocation for ground granulated blast furnace slag
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: No energy or mass flows, except packaging of materials, were excluded

carbon_emission_context.global_co2_emissions: 39% from building environment, 11% from construction materials
carbon_emission_context.2030_target: Embodied carbon of all construction materials needs to be at least 40% lower
carbon_emission_context.2050_target: All new construction materials need to be net zero

recycled_materials_handling.allocation_approach: AusLCI LCA database default for secondary data and processes

Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water. (2023). National Waste Report 2022
EPD International. (2024). General Programme Instructions (GPI) for the International EPD System V4.0
